name: ORS Military Records National
description:
This report displays the number and percentage of ex Military staff for any or all establishments selected at runtime.
PDD0079 v1.0 Last Modified: 01/06/2017

dataset.name: Military Records
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, COUNT(DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_MILITARY_RECORDS AT_MILLITARY_RECORDS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_MILLITARY_RECORDS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND NOT AT_MILLITARY_RECORDS.START_DATE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID <> 'ZZGHI' AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_))) GROUP BY SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)), AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION), dataset_ AS (SELECT UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER, DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Population
dataset.query: DP3_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, COUNT(DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_MILITARY_RECORDS AT_MILLITARY_RECORDS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_MILLITARY_RECORDS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND NOT AT_MILLITARY_RECORDS.START_DATE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID <> 'ZZGHI' AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_))) GROUP BY SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)), AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION), dataset_base_ AS (SELECT COUNT(AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID) AS NUMBER_OF_OFFENDERS, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, DP3_.COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, DP3_ WHERE ((AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS')) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER('DPRWS'))) AND (DP3_.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION), dataset_ AS (SELECT NUMBER_OF_OFFENDERS, DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER END AS V_EX_MILITARY_NULLS, CASE WHEN V_PERCENTAGE_MILITARY IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE V_PERCENTAGE_MILITARY END AS V_MILITARY_PERCENTAGE_NULL FROM dataset_base_)

errors.error: dataset::injectCalculations unable to append column : V_PERCENTAGE_MILITARY :: Error: argument 'sql': 'float' object cannot be converted to 'PyString'
Report field V_PERCENTAGE_MILITARY does not have corresponding dataset schema field
